instruction: Provide the list of ingredients to make a carrot cake.
output:
The ingredients needed to make a carrot cake are: 

- 240 grams (2 cups) all-purpose flour
- 2 teaspoons baking powder 
- 2 teaspoons baking soda 
- 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon 
- 3/4 teaspoon salt 
- 330 millilitres (1 and 1/2 cups) sunflower oil 
- 270 grams (1 and 1/3 cups) light brown sugar
- 4 large eggs 
- 150 millilitres (2/3 cup) buttermilk
- 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
- 250 grams (2 cups) grated carrots 
- 175 grams (1 and 1/3 cups) chopped walnuts
- Icing sugar, for dusting (optional)
